recipe.title: Linguine with Chile, Crab, and Watercress
ingredients: 1 large red chile, seeded and chopped
11 oz canned or frozen (defrosted) precooked crabmeat
instructions: Boil 5 quarts water. With a mortar and pestle, grind garlic and salt into a smooth paste (or mix in a bowl). Add chile and crush until mixture is tinged red. Add crabmeat, breaking it up gently. Pour in oil. Add lemon juice and zest. Beat with a fork. Boil pasta according to package directions until al dente and drain. Top with crab sauce and toss. Add parsley and watercress. Toss again.
